snippet.title: Super Stardust Delta - Housemarque Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Stardust Delta launch trailer. The game is out now for Playstation Vita!

A radical evolution of the top-selling award winning Super Stardust HD for PS3, Super Stardust Delta blasts you on a breathtaking tour through a new galaxy full of epic sights and scenes.

Use Playstation Vita's unique controls and capabilities to unleash spectacular new sci-fi weaponry on your enemies, like the Black Hole Bomb, Super Missile Strike, and EMP blast.

Behold in amazement new gigantic cosmic terrors that now hold entire planets hostage!

Tilt the view and see what's on the other side of the planet, and master the new Super Boost system to rank up some serious highscores!

How high can you score on the global leaderboards?

Features:

- Create incredible black holes using the touchscreen, blast asteroids using the dual analog sticks and deploy devastating shock waves with motion sensitive gameplay

- Enjoy classic gameplay modes from Super Stardust HD and Super Stardust Portable, as well as many brand new modes exclusive to PS Vita

- Shoot your way to the top of the intergalactic leaderboards via PlayStation Network!
